name: HSHS
summary: HSHS! Turn me on is a virtual interactive romance game designed for women. You will take on the role of Pricilla Tang, a new entrant live streaming operations assistant, you will encounter him amidst the hustle and bustle of daily life, leading to a destiny that is uniquely yours!

name: H&SB2: Twilight Gem - Hunter's Quest
summary: The second Demo of Hunter's Quest, featuring five new worlds and a lot of new levels for Hunter and his "ego" to traverse through. Follow the funny story of Hunter and his ridiculous quest to obtain power and be better than his pal, Scorpion! But beware, a third opponent may show up to steal the glory all for himself.

name: H-Sniper: World War II
summary: H-Sniper: World War II is a dynamic shooting game based on a sniper mechanics and inspired by World War II theme. You are playing as one of a few soldiers left, shooting the enemies from a hidden spot on the battleground.

name: HSX: Hypersonic Xtreme
summary:
HSX: HyperSonic Xtreme is a futuristic hover sled racing game. Races take place on elevated tracks littered with speed boosts, shield power ups, and big jumps. There are several game modes, including a cup mode and slalom races, either of which can be played in two player split screen.

One of HSX's major features is it's built-in track editor. The full-featured track editor lets you create your own tracks, complete with flashy special effects.

name: HSV Adventure Racing
summary: HSV Adventure Racing is the Australian version of Beetle Adventure Racing, with the cars changed to HSV.

name: HSS: Reload
summary: This is a very fast God's perspective roguelike shooter, the player will pilot the mech, explore the alien frontier, enjoy the "Crimsonland + Vampire Survivors" endless killing!

name: HS Galaxy
summary: Save the galaxy fighting against Hot Girls Who wants to master the Universe.

name: HSNU
summary: This is an online game about the scene of the High School Affiliated to the Normal University. The game currently only has the function of visiting the campus (you can currently see a few monsters on the campus)
